title: Grand Opening: Boutique Budapest Escape with Daily Breakfast & Spa Access
description:
Tucked away in Budapest's centre, this urban sanctuary is a pocket of calm within the vibrant city, set in a peaceful square in the Palace District. Just a hop, skip and a jump from legendary landmarks like the Chain Bridge, this city break boasts 64 contemporary chambers, a tree-filled courtyard and a blissful wellness spa to soothe your mind and body.

Kick off your day with a freshly cooked breakfast, then wind down as the sun sets in the bar or under the stars in the courtyard. Need to recharge after pounding the pavement? Grab forty winks in plush comfort before hitting the Danube promenade again. This is your launchpad to see Budapest's Parliament Building, Buda Castle and Fisherman’s Bastion.

title: Sophisticated Five-Star Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast & Spa Access
description: History and hedonism sit side by side at the contemporary Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa, a member of the acclaimed Leading Hotels of the World. Occupying an emblematic heritage building designed by legendary architect Ray Rezső - positioned just two blocks from the city’s Grand Boulevard - this stylish outpost is perfectly positioned for days spent wandering up and down the hills of Buda, the flat streets of Pest and alongside the iconic Danube River. Indulge in a massage or beauty treatment at the luxurious Spa by Valmont, or reward yourself with a meal at the Bistro, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes. From the grand lobby, follow the gold-accented staircase to the Oyster Bar for an indulgent gastronomic experience of fresh oysters, caviar and champagne.

vendor_name: Aria Hotel Budapest by Library Hotel Collection
title: Music-Inspired Budapest Boutique Escape with Rooftop Cocktails & Daily Breakfast
description:
Step into a world where luxury meets melody at the five-star Aria Hotel Budapest, an intimate boutique hotel in a grand historic building. Nestled in the city’s lively pedestrian zone, this music-inspired retreat - a member of the prestigious Library Hotel Collection - offers a stay like no other, with a spectacular rooftop terrace garden making for a one-of-a-kind place to enjoy cocktails as the sun sets beneath Budapest’s skyline.

Walk just across the street to reach Hungary's most sacred - and impressive - cathedral, St. Stephen's Basilica, or spend the day exploring the city's best, including Castle Hill and the Royal Palace. Return to the magnificent Harmony Spa or indulge in aperitifs and charcuterie at High Note SkyBar.
location_description: Aria Hotel Budapest by Library Hotel Collection

title: Five-Star Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Spa Access and Dining Credit
description:
History and hedonism sit side by side at this contemporary accommodation, a member of the acclaimed Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Located in a renowned heritage building, this five-star stay is designed by legendary architect Ray Rezső, combining modern luxury with antique elegance.

Positioned just two blocks from the city's Grand Boulevard, Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa is perfectly located for exploring Budapest. Stroll along the famous Danube River, wander up and down the hills of Buda or meander through the flat streets of Pest to absorb the rich culture and diverse landscapes this city has to offer.

Get pampered with a massage or beauty treatment in the majestic Spa by Valmont, or reward yourself with dinner at the Bistro, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes.

title: Glamorous Buddha-Bar Hotel Stay with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Cocktail
description: Explore Hungary’s capital in style with a stay at the Buddha-Bar Hotel Budapest Klotild Palace. Operating under the motto “Not just another hotel, it’s a lifestyle…” this glamorous brand has made a name for itself with over 20 restaurants and hotels around the world. Inside the historic Klotild Palace building, find a luxe hotel with modern amenities including a spa and two gourmet restaurants. Included in your stay is a sumptuous daily breakfast, a welcome cocktail and an exclusive 15% spa discount.

title: Sophisticated Five-Star Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast & 90-Minute Spa Access
description:
History and hedonism sit side by side at the contemporary Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa, a member of the Leading Hotels of the World. Occupying an emblematic heritage building designed by legendary architect Ray Rezső in the early 20th century and just two blocks from the city’s Grand Boulevard, this stylish outpost is perfectly positioned for days spent wandering up and down the hills of Buda, the flat streets of Pest and alongside the iconic Danube River.

Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa offers a masterclass in distinctive design as it effortlessly combines heritage features with a modern minimalist aesthetic across its lobby, rooms and suites. Slink to the sleek wellness centre for relaxed laps in the indoor heated pool or take it up a notch at the fitness centre. Bring it all back down again with a massage or beauty treatment at the luxurious Spa by Valmont, or reward yourself with a meal at the Bistro, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes. From the grand lobby, follow the gold-accented staircase to the Oyster Bar for an indulgent gastronomic experience of fresh oysters, caviar and champagne.

title: Grand Opening: Budapest Luxury Escape near Danube River with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Bar
description:
Be swept off your feet at this five-star luxury haven in the heart of Budapest, where refined elegance meets a relaxed, down-to-earth atmosphere. Celebrate the hotel's grand opening by unwinding in the hot tub at the wellness centre, savouring mouthwatering local delicacies at AGOS restaurant or kicking back with a custom cocktail at the chic Fennen rooftop garden.

A stone's throw from must-see sights like the Parliament Building and the Danube River, you're ideally positioned to explore the city and experience the transformation of this long-forgotten 19th-century building. Discover the vibrant Great Market Hall, indulge in irresistible goulash and lángos or immerse yourself in history at Buda Castle and Fisherman's Bastion.

title: Brand New W Budapest Heritage Palace with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Cocktails
description:
A modern tribute to a historical gem, this hotel is a dazzling example of contemporary chic, housed in the emblematic Drechsler Palace. Situated on Andrássy Avenue, a UNESCO World Heritage site, this escape stands tall amid luxury boutiques and offers grand views of the Hungarian State Opera House.

Inside, the W Budapest is a treat for the senses. Indulge in a journey of relaxation and rejuvenation at the subterranean AWAY Spa, enjoy innovative dining among the gilded interiors of W Lounge or groove at the W Bar with its resident DJ. Every corner is designed to evoke relaxation and excitement, with subtle nods to Budapest’s cultural heritage.

Found in the heart of Budapest’s most prestigious shopping district, guests have unfettered access to the city’s highlights. Visit the majestic St. Stephen’s Basilica for the best views over Budapest, take a dip in one of the 123 thermal baths in the “City of Spas” or check out the symbolic Heroes’ Square and Buda Castle District for a deeper dive into the city’s storied past.

title: Designer Budapest Luxury near Danube River with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Rooftop Bar
description:
Be swept off your feet at this five-star designer haven in the heart of Budapest, where refined elegance meets a relaxed, down-to-earth atmosphere. Unwind in the hot tub at the wellness centre, savour mouthwatering local delicacies at AGOS Kitchen or kick back with a custom cocktail at the chic Fennen Skybar.

A stone's throw from must-see sights like the Parliament Building and the Danube River, you're ideally positioned to explore the city and experience the transformation of this long-forgotten 19th-century building. Discover the vibrant Great Market Hall, indulge in irresistible goulash and lángos or immerse yourself in history at Buda Castle and Fisherman's Bastion.

title: Five-Star Sofitel Stay on the Danube River
description: Discover Hungary’s striking capital city and get lost wandering through the bustling cobbled streets and perusing the many quaint shops with a three, five or seven-nights stay at the five-star Sofitel Budapest Chain Bridge, perched on the banks of the stunning Danube River. Indulge in daily buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner, a cocktail each and a welcome glass of sparkling wine on arrival. Plus, one child (aged 12 years and under) stays free.

title: Sophisticated Five-Star Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast
description:
History and hedonism sit side by side at the contemporary Kozmo Hotel Budapest, Hungary's only Leading Hotels of the World member. Occupying an emblematic heritage building two blocks from the city’s Grand Boulevard, this chic outpost is perfectly positioned for days spent wandering up and down the hills of Buda, the flat streets of Pest and alongside the iconic Danube River.

Kozmo Hotel Budapest offers a masterclass in distinctive design, effortlessly combining heritage features with a modern minimalist aesthetic across its lobby, rooms and suites. Slink to the sleek wellness centre for relaxed laps in the indoor heated pool or take it up a notch at the fitness centre. Bring it all back down again with a massage or beauty treatment, or reward yourself with a meal at the restaurant, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes. An open kitchen gives you a front-row seat to the culinary magic, best accompanied by a wine from the extensive list of Old and New World producers.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions:**

- Graze your way through a **daily breakfast buffet** of continental classics and à la carte hot dishes
- Start your stay with a seasonal **drink on arrival**
- Relax and recharge with a **one-hour spa pass** (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Travelling with family?** Choose a Family Room for up to four guests, comprised of two connecting but independent Standard Rooms to ensure privacy and peace.

title: Contemporary Boutique Escape in Budapest's Castle District with Rooftop Bar & Sauna
description:
Perched dramatically at the entrance of the Széchenyi Chain Bridge, this boutique hotel is an architectural marvel with a distinctive facade that captures the essence of Budapest's urban landscape. Fuel up with a delicious brunch of eggs royale and grilled sausages at the LEO Bistro, or skip straight to the rooftop for cocktails paired with jaw-dropping cityscapes. Unwind at the fitness centre with its Finnish dry sauna or visit one of the art exhibitions held in the Art Corner. 

Hotel Clark Budapest sits right in the Castle District, meaning you're steps from the remarkable Széchenyi Chain Bridge and a short walk from Buda Castle and Fisherman's Bastion for scenic city views. If you want to check out buzzing bars, cafes and shops, cross the bridge to the Pest side in no time at all. Plus, with trams and metros close by, exploring the city is a breeze.

title: Five-Star Budapest Glamour on the Danube Promenade with Buda Castle Views
description: Blessed with one of the city’s best addresses - on the Danube Promenade just steps from a vibrant dining and bar scene and the somber Shoes on the Danube sculpture - the five-star InterContinental Budapest, an IHG Hotel, was made for riverside relaxation in the heart of the city. Enjoy authentic Lebanese cuisine at ARZ Lebanese Restaurant, cocktails overlooking Buda Castle at Corso Bar and Terrace, a fully equipped fitness area, serene spa, and the exclusive Club InterContinental.
offer_address: Apáczai Csere J. u. 12-14. Budapest, 1052 Hungary

title: Brilliant Budapest City Break with Traditional Hungarian Restaurant
description: Immerse yourself in the buzz of Budapest at Crowne Plaza Budapest, an IHG Hotel, a modern urban escape in the heart of the city. Between days of exploring, spend time in the hotel's rooftop garden, work out at the fitness centre or enjoy a steam at the sauna. Feeling peckish? Make your way to Axis Cafe and Lounge for a deep dive into traditional Hungarian cuisine before taking the short 20-minute stroll to the iconic Hungarian Parliament Building.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Budapest, an IHG Hotel

title: Top-Rated Self-Contained Luxury Suites in the Heart of Budapest
description:
Discover Budapest’s dramatic history and flamboyant architecture from the top-rated Úttö Luxury Suites, a beautiful Baroque palace home to stunning self-contained suites. Situated in the heart of the vibrant Ferencváros neighbourhood, this emblematic building is a 20-minute walk from the Dohány Street Synagogue and Central Market Hall, which comes alive with stalls selling local delicacies Monday to Saturday. Other must-see attractions such as the iconic Hungarian Parliament Building, Heroes' Square, St. Stephen's Basilica and Fisherman's Bastion can easily be reached by public transport or car.

Úttö Luxury Suites invites you to discover one of the most fascinating cities in Europe while enjoying contemporary facilities, perfectly complemented by panoramic Budapest vistas. Each one, two or three-bedroom suite features stunning interior design and modern amenities including high-speed Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchenettes. With countless five-star reviews on Tripadvisor and a Travellers' Choice 2020 badge, this unique palace is the perfect choice for your adventure in Hungary's capital.

title: Five-Star City Break in the Heart of Budapest with Rooftop Bar & Onsite Spa
description: Enter a world of intrigue at the imaginative and uniquely styled Mystery Hotel Budapest, a five-star boutique hotel in the heart of Hungary's capital. Housed in a 19th-century palace, this eclectic hotel is a striking landmark in the city's sixth district. On the fourth floor of the hotel, you'll find The Great Hall Restaurant & Lounge, as opulent as a palace ballroom and the perfect spot to sit and admire the centrepiece chandelier over a glass of wine or slice of cake. For incredible city views and a tasty array of bar snacks and drinks (think burgers and marinated olives, plus a wide range of spirits and gin and tonic cocktails), make your way to The Sky Garden. Within a Baroque-style garden, you'll find The Secret Garden Day Spa, where whirlpool spas, a Finnish sauna and a range of body treatments offer absolute relaxation.
